resources.string: This example reads and displays raw data from the device accelerometer.

This example makes use of Sensor.TYPE_SIGNIFICANT_MOTION, which will trigger an event when \"significant motion\" is detected via the device accelerometer. Trigger events fire only once. A confirmation Toast will be displayed on event process.
This example tracks dynamic sensor connections and disconnections. A Toast will be displayed for every (dis)connection. Some devices may not support dynamic sensor discovery and registration.
